build.buildCommand: python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages uvicorn fastapi -r backend/requirements.txt && npm install

preDeployCommand: python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages uvicorn fastapi -r backend/requirements.txt
